00019 #ifndef SP_WINDOW_H

00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00031 namespace Spark
00032 {
00033 
00034 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 class SpWindow
00038 {
00039 
00040 // Typedefs:
00041 public:
00042 
00043     // include the key bindings within the window class definition
00044     #include "SpKeyBindings.h"
00045 
00046 // Construction:
00047 public:
00048 
00049     virtual ~SpWindow();
00050 
00051 // Callbacks:
00052 public:
00053 
00054     // initialize/terminate signal handlers
00055     virtual bool onStartup();
00056     virtual bool onInitialize();
00057     virtual void onTerminate();
00058 
00059     // window signal handlers
00060     virtual void onMove(int iX, int iY);
00061     virtual void onReshape(int iWidth, int iHeight);
00062     virtual void onUpdate( int iValue );
00063     virtual void onDisplay();
00064 
00065     // keyboard signal handlers
00066     virtual void onKeyDown(unsigned char ucKey, int iX, int iY);
00067     virtual void onKeyUp(unsigned char ucKey, int iX, int iY);
00068     virtual void onSpecialKeyDown(int iKey, int iX, int iY);
00069     virtual void onSpecialKeyUp(int iKey, int iX, int iY);
00070 
00071     // mouse signal handlers
00072     virtual void onPassiveMotion(int iX, int iY);
00073     virtual void onMouseMotion(int iX, int iY, unsigned int uiModifiers);
00074     virtual void onMouseClick( int iButton, int iState, int iX, int iY,unsigned int uiModifiers);
00075 
00076     // idle signal handlers
00077     virtual void onIdle();
00078 
00079     // draw methods (later will be moved to a proper Renderer class)
00080     void drawImage(
00081         const unsigned char* aucBuffer,
00082         unsigned int uiPosX, unsigned int uiPosY, unsigned int uiWidth,
00083         unsigned int uiHeight, bool bAlpha);
00084 
00085     void drawImage(
00086         const float* afBuffer,
00087         unsigned int uiPosX, unsigned int uiPosY, unsigned int uiWidth,
00088         unsigned int uiHeight, bool bAlpha);
00089 
00090     void drawString(const char* pcString, int iX, int iY, const SpColor4f& rkColor);
00091     void drawFrameRate(int iX, int iY, const SpColor4f& rkColor);
00092 
00093 // Special Request Methods:
00094 public:
00095 
00096     // special request methods
00097     virtual void postRedisplay();
00098     virtual void swapBuffers();
00099 
00100     // performance query methods
00101     void updateClicks();
00102 
00103 // State Methods:
00104 public:
00105 
00106     // access to the unique SpWindow object
00107     static SpWindow* current();
00108     void makeCurrent();
00109 
00110     // access to members set by constructor
00111     char* title();
00112     unsigned int x();
00113     unsigned int y();
00114     unsigned int width();
00115     unsigned int height();
00116     const SpColor4f& bg();
00117     SpTimer& timer();
00118 
00119     void setWindowId(int iSpWindowID);
00120     int id();
00121 
00122 // Internal Methods:
00123 protected:
00124 
00125     // restricted construction (must be derived!)
00126     SpWindow(char* acWindowTitle, int iX, int iY, int iWidth,
00127         int iHeight, const SpColor4f& rkBgColor);
00128 
00129 // Internal Data:
00130 protected:
00131 
00132     // mouse update data members
00133     bool m_bMouseDown;
00134     bool m_bLeftMousePressed;
00135     bool m_bRightMousePressed;
00136     bool m_bMiddleMousePressed;
00137     int m_iLastMouseX;
00138     int m_iLastMouseY;
00139 
00140     // performance measurements
00141     float m_fFrameRate;
00142     int m_iClicks;
00143     int m_iTimer;
00144     int m_iMaxTimer;
00145 
00146     // window data members
00147     static SpWindow* ms_pkWindow;
00148     char* m_acWindowTitle;
00149     int m_iSpWindowID;
00150     int m_iX, m_iY;
00151     int m_iWidth, m_iHeight;
00152     SpColor4f m_kBgColor;
00153     SpTimer m_kTimer;
00154 };
